statements: DELETE FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand > 0.5 AND competition < 0.3;
DELETE FROM competition WHERE competitor_id = 100 AND pricing_strategy = 'Aggressive';
DELETE FROM competitors WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM competitors WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp' AND market_share > 0.5;
DELETE FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand < 100 AND competition_level > 5;
DELETE FROM saas_industry WHERE industry_category = 'Technology' AND subscription_price > 1000;
DELETE FROM competition WHERE competitive_ranking <= 3 AND competitors >= 5;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND subscription_plan = 'Gold';
